How to do a disk full copy
To make a fully copy of a disk (including MBR) :
1) Put the target and the source disk on the same machine
2) Boot with a live Os
3) Be Sure to know what is the source disk and what is the target disk This command can help you : sudo fdisk -l
4) then you can copy sudo dd if=/dev/sdXXX of=/dev/sdXXX by replacing "XXX" by the letter of your disk
